articles.title: England don't play enough 50-over cricket - Root
articles.description: England need to play more domestic and international 50-over cricket to stay competitive at World Cups, says batter Joe Root.
articles.content:
England need to play more domestic and international 50-over cricket to keep competing at World Cups, says Joe Root.

articles.title: Afghanistan claim historic win over Pakistan
articles.description: Watch highlights as Afghanistan beat Pakistan for the first time in one day cricket with an eight-wicket victory in Chennai at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.content: Up Next. 'You have one chance, be ready' - Xavi's advice to Guiu before debut. Video, 00:00:57'You have one chance, be ready' - Xavi's advice to Guiu before debut

articles.title: Afghanistan stun Pakistan in World Cup thriller
articles.description: Afghanistan secure highest ever run chase in one-day international cricket with a stunning eight-wicket win over Pakistan in Chennai.
articles.content:

Pakistan 282-7 (50 overs): Babar 74 (92), Shafique 58 (75); Noor 3-39

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
